posts.post_content: In general it is a great card for elf decks. But it is best not used if you know the person you are going against has either [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) or [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment), unless you always plan on keeping two mana untapped to make this card sacrifice itself.
posts.html:
In general it is a great card for elf decks. But it is best not used if you know the person you are going against has either Wrath of God or Day of Judgment, unless you always plan on keeping two mana untapped to make this card sacrifice itself.
